title: creditCard
description: This schema is used to associate a credit card for use with your merchant account

card_holder_name.description: the name on the credit card

credit_card_number.description: the number on the credit card

cc_billing_address_line_1.description: line 1 of the credit card billing address

cc_billing_address_line_2.description: line 2 of the credit card billing address

cc_billing_address_zip.description: credit card billing address zip code
